title: Attraction Fundamentals
subtitle: Understand what actually creates connection

questions.question: What is attraction primarily based on?
options: A combination of presence, energy, confidence, and authenticity

questions.question: Why is presence attractive?
options: It shows you have nowhere else to be
Being fully present with someone makes them feel seen and valued

questions.question: What is polarity in attraction?
options: The energetic dance between masculine and feminine energies
Living far apart from each other

questions.question: What's the difference between confidence and arrogance?
options: Confidence is grounded self-assurance; arrogance is insecurity masked as superiority

questions.question: Why do 'techniques' and 'tactics' often fail in dating?
options: People can sense inauthenticity, and manipulation erodes real connection
They only work on certain people
